icon_auto AUTOMATED: This enemy is automated, meaning it cannot be crew-killed. Systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room.
icon_auto_boss AUTO OVERRIDE: This enemy is also protected by an automated mode that will take over if all of the crew are dead. If auto-mode activates, the ship will gain all benefits that Auto-ships receive. It is impossible to neutralize this vessel via crew kill.
icon_auto_storyteller AUTOMATED (SPECIAL): This enemy is automated, but still relies on its crew to run. Systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room. However, the ship can still be crew killed.
icon_threat HIGH LEVEL THREAT: This enemy might pose a major threat to an unprepared vessel. Think carefully if this is an enemy you want to face, and keep your engines ready to run if things go south.
icon_majorthreat MAJOR LEVEL THREAT: This ship poses a significant and likely fatal threat to your ship and crew. Avoid conflict with this enemy at all costs.
icon_bigmeanie BAD MAN: THIS IS BIG MEANIE!!! Dylan no LIKE BIG MEANIE! KILL. KILL KILL KILL KILL! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA FASDASHFH
icon_lowthreat LOW LEVEL THREAT: This enemy poses very little threat to your vessel. Feel free to disregard any threats made by the captain of this sorry ship.
icon_specialwep SPECIAL WEAPON: This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.
icon_specialwep_chaos CHAOTIC WEAPON: This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.
icon_surge POWER SURGE: This enemy has one or more power surges that it will activate periodically throughout the fight. Nothing can stop these from occuring except the defeat of your opponent, so try and kill the enemy quickly before things get out of hand!
icon_station STATION: This enemy is a station, meaning it has zero evasion without cloaking.
icon_resist RESISTANT ROOMS: This enemy has one or more resistant rooms, marked by the grey border and R icon in the top left. Resistant rooms will take no system damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take ion and hull damage as normal.
icon_ionresist CHARGED RESISTANT ROOMS: This enemy has one or more charged resistant rooms, marked by the teal border and R icon in the top left. Charged Resistant rooms will take no system or ion damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take hull damage as normal.
icon_no2 DEPRESSURIZED: This enemy is depressurized, meaning it has no Oxygen system. Oxygen restoring crew such as Orchids will not be able to fill this ship with oxygen. Boarding with aerobic crew is not advised without proper precautions.
icon_chaos CHAOTIC: This ship's rooms are protected by some kind of mysterious energy. All non-Siren crew onboard this ship will be overcome by madness, blocking the use of their active abilities. Once they return to your ship, they will go back to normal.
icon_invasion INVASION TACTICS: This enemy uses special boarding tactics. Rather than teleporting back crew at low health, it will prioritize sending in more crew instead.
icon_math EDUTAINMENT: The malfunctioning Auto is programmed to periodically ask you mathematical questions. Getting these questions wrong could lead to dangerous results, so be careful!
icon_shieldboost SHIELD BOOSTER: This enemy's shields recharge 17% quicker.
icon_engineboost ENGINE BOOSTER: This enemy's FTL drive charge up 30% faster.
icon_weaponboost AUTO RELOADER: This enemy's weapons charge 10% faster.
icon_recontele RECONSTRUCTIVE TELEPORTER: This enemy's crew heal to full every time they teleport.
icon_respirators RESPIRATORS: This enemy's crew suffocate at half speed.
icon_ionarmor ION FIELD: This enemy has a 50% chance to resist all ion damage.
icon_backupdna BACKUP DNA: This enemy's crew will be kept alive in the Clone Bay even if it is destroyed or hacked.
icon_burrows BURROWS: Enemy Leeches move 50% faster and ignore doors.
icon_no2_respirators NO SUFFOCATION: This enemy is not only depressurized, but its own crew will not suffocate while aboard their own ship. They will still suffocate (if applicable) aboard your ship.
icon_reality REALITY MANIPULATOR: Periodically throughout this fight, random hazards will spawn. These can be stars, asteroid fields, pulsars, or ion storms.
icon_nanomedbay MED-BOTS: This enemy's crew will passively heal anywhere on their ship so long as their Medbay is powered, at 25% speed of the current Medbay power level.
icon_droneboost DRONE BOOSTER: This enemy's crew drones are granted double movement speed, a 50% boost to combat/sabotage damage and repair/extinguishing speed, and a 20% boost to crew healing.
icon_scrambler DEFENSE SCRAMBLER: This enemy will jam your Defense Drones, making them incapable of firing. Is only active so long as the enemy Hacking system is functional (or present) - destroy it for your drones to return to normal.
icon_casing TITANIUM SYSTEM CASING: Your crew will sabotage this enemy's systems 60% slower. These systems also have a 15% chance to resist direct damage.
icon_grid EMANCIPATION GRID: This enemy's systems are extra protected from Ghost erosion, reducing their sabotage damage by 20%. If a door system is present, all crew and drones (including anaerobic crew) will take a base damage of 4hp/s with an extra 1hp for each level of Door Control above 1.
icon_pheromones PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 25% movement speed and 6.25% maximum health.
icon_freepheromones SYNTHETIC PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with unstable pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 15% combat damage. Each level above 1 reduces repair speed by 25%.
icon_suzpheromones SUZERAIN PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with superior pheromones. For each active power bar in Oxygen, their crew get a bonus 33% movement speed and 15% reduced ability cooldowns.
icon_bypass ENERGY BYPASS: This enemy can teleport crew or bombs, and mind control through Energy Shields. Its ordinary projectiles will still be unable to penetrate through.
icon_zoltan_shield ENERGY SHIELD: This enemy is protected by an Energy Shield. Hacking, Mind Control, boarding drones, teleportation, and all hull-damaging and/or ion weapons will all be blocked until disabled.
icon_aether_shield AETHER SHIELD: This enemy is protected by a stronger than usual Energy Shield. In addition to the usual Super Shield benefits, shields also recharge 20% faster.
icon_ascended_shield ASCENDED SHIELD: This enemy is protected by a sophisticated and resilient Energy Shield. In addition to the usual Super Shield benefits, shields also recharge 45% faster.
icon_greenhouse KERNEL GREENHOUSE: This enemy possesses an on-board greenhouse, which gives it a 65% chance to not use ammunition when firing its weapons.
icon_spores SPORE DISPENSARY: This enemy pollutes its air with toxic spores, which will make enemy boarders take 20% more damage from all sources.
icon_shell_gas TOXIC GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. Shells, Ghosts, Lanius and Vampweeds are immune.
icon_shell_gas_heal EXPEDITIVE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. While the enemy Medbay is powered, their crew will heal at 90% speed of level 1 Medbay outside of it. Shells, Ghosts, Lanius and Vampweeds are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.
icon_shell_gas_repair NANITE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time. Actively puts out fires and repairs breaches on the enemy ship. Shells, Ghosts, Lanius and Vampweeds are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.
icon_hackstun NEURAL DISRUPTOR: All crew in the room during this enemy's hacking pulse will be stunned.
icon_sluggel BREACH SEALANT: Breaches on this enemy will automatically be repaired even in the absence of crew. Also provides 35% combat resistance and 50% hazard resistance in empty rooms.
icon_cloakfire SHADOW WEAPONRY: This enemy can fire while cloaked without a penalty to its duration.
icon_crystal_armor CRYSTALLINE ARMOR: Every time you deal hull damage to this enemy with your weapons, there is a 33% chance that a shard will break off and fly towards your ship. It will not pierce any shields, but will do 1 damage to a random room if it hits.
icon_extinguishers EXTINGUISHERS: Fires aboard this enemy will be automatically extinguished even in the absence of crew.
icon_rock_armor ROCK PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 17% chance to resist hull damage from your weapons.
icon_regen_armor REGENERATIVE PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 10% chance to resist hull damage, and will automatically repair breaches even in the absence of crew.
icon_salt_armor SODIUM PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy makes it resilient to ion damage. Additionally, it has a very minor chance of resisting system damage.
icon_paladin_armor DIVINE ARMOR: Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Has a 70% chance to resist hull damage, but cannot resist weapons with a guaranteed breach chance.
